tier3_industry.text: Internally,  Meta says their new model Avocado is the best pre-trained model ever!! -  reporting by The Information

Kling 3.0 here and its time for a best model update

Coding - Opus 4.5 (don't even dream of anything else)
Best small model - Gemini Flash 3.0 
Video - Kling 3.0
Images -  Nano Banana Pro
Base for fine-tune - GLM or Qwen
OCR - Flash 2.5
Data analysis - GPT 5.2 thinking
Audio - Hume (very underrated)
